name: Speedy Chicken- The Egg Saver
description:
Being an orphan egg or chick in a cruel world which is full of eaters...
Our Speedy Chicken is the only hope who will get attention and save them from lot of different wild animals, demons and monsters.

Run as fast as you can, collect the eggs which will turn to little chicks, take them to the coop and save them from the eaters.

- Quality graphics
- Nice and funny gameplay
- 3 themes
